<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fulu of Fire Suppression](/Equipment.aspx?ID=975)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 159 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 week

**Usage** affixed to a wall

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The silver ink on this black paper charm ebbs in and out of sight, especially when caught out of the corner of your eye. Usually placed in the kitchen, this fulu slows the spread of fire in a 30-foot radius by half.

 If the fulu itself catches fire, as it burns, it releases a shower of water in a 30-foot cone, automatically putting out non-magical fires in this area and attempting to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) any magical [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) effects with a +7 counteract modifier and a counteract level of 2; when this happens, the fulu's duration ends early.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Fulu of Fire Suppression
